title: Upgrade @nuxt/kit to v4
description:
Upgrade @nuxt/kit from ^3.13.0 to ^4.0.0.

Steps:
1. Update package.json dependency
2. Run pnpm install
3. Fix any TypeScript errors
4. Update any deprecated API usage identified in research

Test: pnpm run build succeeds
closed_reason: Upgraded @nuxt/kit to ^4.0.0 and updated module compatibility to >=3.0.0
